Class ProblemDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • kmu.itsp.score.core.dao.CommonDAOImpl
      • kmu.itsp.score.problem.ProblemDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonDAO, ProblemDAO

    @Repository
public class ProblemDAOImpl
extends CommonDAOImpl
implements ProblemDAO
    문제에 대한 정보가 담긴 DB에 access하는 Repository 클래스
    Author:
    WJ
